### Load packages
```{r}
library(readxl)
```

### Load data
```{r}
indexes <- read_excel("../data/PS1_data.xls", sheet="hard_copy", range="E1:L3", col_names = FALSE)
prices <- read_excel("../data/PS1_data.xls", sheet="hard_copy", range="D3:L3245")
exchange_rates <- read_excel("../data/PS1_data.xls", sheet="hard_copy", range="N1:U3245")
market_cap <- read_excel("../data/PS1_data.xls", sheet="market_cap")
```
